typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sepal_length_cm as decimal(8,2),
		sepal_width_cm as decimal(8,2),
		petal_length_cm as decimal(8,2),
		petal_width_cm as decimal(8,2),
		class as string,
		collect_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		class
	)) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		sepal_length_cm as decimal(8,2),
		sepal_width_cm as decimal(8,2),
		petal_length_cm as decimal(8,2),
		petal_width_cm as decimal(8,2),
		class as string,
		collect_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	rowUrlColumn:'class',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		sepal_length_cm,
		sepal_width_cm,
		petal_length_cm,
		petal_width_cm,
		class,
		collect_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
